description: These veggie tacos are the perfect meat-free option for Mexican night.
name: Smokey Eggplant Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the eggplant, red onion and capsicums on a baking tray, drizzle with oil, chipotle paste and half of the lime juice and toss to coat. Roast for 25-30 minutes.
If your tortilla wraps are large, use a round cutter to make small tacos. Wrap in foil and add to the oven to heat for the last 4 minutes of cooking.
Fill the tacos with the veggie mix, squeeze over lime juice to taste and serve with grated cheese and chopped coriander on top.
